text: Lepidopleurus fairchildi is a species of chiton in the family Leptochitonidae. ==Distribution== This species is endemic to Australia's Macquarie Island in the Southern Ocean south of New Zealand.Powell A. W. B., New Zealand Mollusca, William Collins Publishers Ltd, Auckland, New Zealand 1979 ==Habitat== This chiton lives on intertidal rocks. ==References== Category:Leptochitonidae Category:Molluscs described in 1929
title: Lepidopleurus fairchildi
